name: FNAW Area 51 Edition 0: Site 51
description:
--------------------------------Mod of FNAW: Twisted Factory 2---------------------------------

Story: (Nights 1-6)

Its been a decade since the Mushroom Branch of the SCP Foundation has been established. A total of 8 entities have been contained within Site 51 during the late 1970s to late 2000s. E. Gadd applied for a job at Site 51 as a Night guard to make sure no entity escapes and to make sure nothing goes wrong. During this time Luigi also applied for job at the foundation and was appointed commander of Mobile Task Force "Hammer Down" due to his expertise in dealing with the anomalous over the years since 1985. It was also during this time the foundation built Area 51 somewhere in the middle of Present Day Dimble Wood. The Rest is History....

Story (Data Collection Sections): Aftermath 2016-2030

Its been 14 years since Luigi got infected Initially and the Mushroom Kingdom is now overrun with dangerous entities infecting and killing civilians and some of Bowser's Minions. Peach declared martial law in all parts of the Mushroom Kingdom until further notice. With the casualty count rising to the millions over the coming months, E. Gadd went to the abandoned Site 51 to collect classified data on what's happened and what he's dealing with here. Only time will tell if he succeeds or dies trying.
